DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study analyze effect static stretch active warm , isolate associate , functional performance lower limbs college volleyball athlete . Study hypothesis : H0 : The stretch / warm , alone combination , alter functional performance volleyball player . H1 : The stretch / warm , alone combination , alter functional performance volleyball player .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Effect Static Stretching Muscle Warming Functional Performance College Volleyball Athletes
DOC.detailed_description: This cross-over study contain 11 volleyball athlete randomly divide 5 group : control ( C ) , warming-up ( gAQ ) , stretch ( gAL ) , warming-up stretching ( gAQAL ) , stretch warming-up ( gALAQ ) . All subject underwent evaluation measure functional performance conduct pre post intervention .
DOC.criteria: 1. male ; 2. age 18 28 year age ; 3. previous history orthopedic disorder , rheumatic disorder , cardiovascular , metabolic / vestibular neurological disorder prevent participate study dysfunction ; 4. history injury , trauma disease lower limb last six month , without surgery ; 5. participate University Selection UFRN ; 6. training time display mode two year frequency least three time week . 1. presence injury survey period ; 2. conduct evaluative intervention procedure ; 3. waiver participate .
